ArithmeticConversions.py produced the following alternate forms ...

```
add_to_sub with input a+b ...
    (a+b) ⟶ (a-(-1*b))
add_to_sub with input 0+9 ...
    (0+9) ⟶ (0-(-1*9))
sub_to_add with input a-b ...
    (a-b) ⟶ (a+(-1*b))
sub_to_add with input 0-9 ...
    (0-9) ⟶ (0+(-1*9))
```
